name: netflixclone
description: This Netflix Clone is a feature-rich movie streaming application built using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. It provides users with a seamless experience to explore, search, and watch movie trailers while ensuring secure authentication and a responsive design. The project replicates the core functionalities of Netflix, delivering a smooth and visually appealing interface.

scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
